refnamediv.refpurpose: Globs cmd_string against the MGED database resulting in an expanded command string.

refsection.para: Globs cmd_string against the MGED database resulting in an expanded command string.
The example shows the use of the db_glob command to return an expanded command string.

info.title: Return an expanded command string to list specified objects.

example.para: Returns a command string to list objects r230 through r239.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
